channel.title: Endosomal Trafficking on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Endosomal Trafficking on RD's Blog

item.title: Rapid Whole Cell Imaging Reveals a Calcium-APPL1-Dynein Nexus that Regulates Cohort Trafficking of Stimulated EGF Receptors
item.description: Notes on the 2021 Nature Communications paper revealing a calcium-dependent APPL1-dynein mechanism that coordinates collective EGFR trafficking to the perinuclear region following stimulation.
